column4: any one be able to help me with being able to play dvds on my comp, the error reads that i need libdvdcss, i dont know where i would look to find this
open a terminal and type sudo apt-get install libdvdcss
or search for it in synaptic
if you cant find it in synaptic, the term wont yield better results. synaptic is a front end for apt
